titles.title: A resolution authorizing the taking of a photograph in the Chamber of the United States Senate.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 6/8/2006--Passed Senate without amendment. Suspends specified provisions of Rule IV of the Rules for the Regulation of the Senate Wing of the U.S. Capitol (prohibiting the taking of pictures in the Senate Chamber) to permit an official photograph to be taken of Members of the U.S. Senate on June 13, 2006.
